info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Saratoga, southern Washington and north central Rensselaer Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 440 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saratoga Springs to 7 miles southwest of Greenwich to near Mechanicville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Mechanicville, Salem, Cambridge, Greenwich, Round Lake, Country Knolls, Gates, Malta, Lee, Northumberland, Easton, Stillwater, Schuylerville, Victory, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, Argyle, Deans Corners and Grangerville. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 10 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central New York...and southern Vermont.
